$SW   $6, 0($0);	Salvar 0 em 0x0000	10101100000001100000000000000000
$ADDi $6, $0, 1;	1 numero 1		00100000000001100000000000000001
SW    $6, 1($0);	Salvar 1 em 0x0001	10101100000001100000000000000001
SW    $6, 2($0);	Salvar 1 em 0x0002	10101100000001100000000000000010
SW    $6, 4($0);	Salvar 1 em 0x0004	10101100000001100000000000000100
SW    $6, 8($0);	Salvar 1 em 0x0008	10101100000001100000000000001000
$ADDi $6, $6, 1;	2 numeros 1		00100000110001100000000000000001
SW    $6, 3($0);	Salvar 2 em 0x0003	10101100000001100000000000000011
SW    $6, 5($0);	Salvar 2 em 0x0005	10101100000001100000000000000101
SW    $6, 6($0);	Salvar 2 em 0x0006	10101100000001100000000000000110
SW    $6, 9($0);	Salvar 2 em 0x0009	10101100000001100000000000001001
SW    $6, A($0);	Salvar 2 em 0x000A	10101100000001100000000000001010
SW    $6, C($0);	Salvar 2 em 0x000C	10101100000001100000000000001100
$ADDi $6, $6, 1;	3 numeros 1		00100000110001100000000000000001
SW    $6, 7($0);	Salvar 3 em 0x0007	10101100000001100000000000000111
SW    $6, B($0);	Salvar 3 em 0x000B	10101100000001100000000000001011
SW    $6, D($0);	Salvar 3 em 0x000D	10101100000001100000000000001101
SW    $6, E($0);	Salvar 3 em 0x000E	10101100000001100000000000001110
$ADDi $6, $6, 1;	4 numeros 1		00100000110001100000000000000001
SW    $6, F($0);	Salvar 4 em 0x000F	10101100000001100000000000001111
LW    $7, 2($0);	Load 0x0002 em $7	10001100000001110000000000000010
LW    $7, 6($0);	Load 0x0006 em $7	10001100000001110000000000000110
LW    $7, B($0);	Load 0x000B em $7	10001100000001110000000000001011
LW    $7, F($0);	Load 0x000F em $7	10001100000001110000000000001111

0001	1
